The sketch will be scaled by 0.75 during this extrusion. These intermediate parts will be built upon the previously constructed parts. The final shape will combine all intermediate parts into a complete CAD assembly, as listed in the "final_shape" property of the provided CAD assembly JSON. In this case, the final shape is a rectangular prism with various cutouts and protrusions.</description>
